sn52.10:1: On one occasion the Venerable Anuruddha was dwelling at Sāvatthī in the Blind Men's Grove, sick, afflicted, gravely ill. Then a number of bhikkhus approached the Venerable Anuruddha and said to him:
sn52.10:2: "In what dwelling does the Venerable Anuruddha usually dwell so that the arisen bodily painful feelings do not persist obsessing his mind?"
